snippet: Rhode Island and federal officials are investigating the demise of 38 Studios, run by the retired Red Sox star Curt Schilling.
abstract: Thirty-Eight Studios, video game company run by retired baseball star Curt Schilling, files for bankruptcy; move comes as Rhode Island and federal officials begin investigating the company, which was buoyed by financial support from the state.
lead_paragraph: Rhode Island and federal officials are investigating the demise of 38 Studios, run by the retired Red Sox star Curt Schilling.

headline.seo: Curt Schilling’s Video Game Company Is Bankrupt
headline.main: Ex-Pitcher’s Video Game Company Goes Bankrupt
headline.print_headline: Ex-Pitcher’s Video Game Company Goes Bankrupt
